name: Baycloud Systems
goal: Developing software tools and systems to support fundamental rights. To make it easier for businesses to establish trust with customers by offering them clearly informed and fully flexible choice over data collected via the web.
interests: Competition, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Data Protection Directive 1995
ePrivacy Directive 2002 amended 2009
ePrivacy review process 2016
General Data Protection Regulation 2017
PrivacyShield
